survey_name: Customer Satisfaction Survey for Indoor Smart Gardening Systems
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from users of indoor smart gardening systems to understand satisfaction levels, feature preferences, and areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with your indoor smart gardening system overall?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for satisfaction measurement.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with your indoor smart gardening system overall?

questions.question_text: Which features do you use most frequently in your indoor smart gardening system? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Multiple-choice question; include an 'Other' option to capture unlisted features.
questions.scripter_notes: Multi-choice checkboxes; include an optional open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Which features do you use most frequently in your indoor smart gardening system? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: Please describe any challenges you have faced while using your indoor smart gardening system.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback.

script.question_text: Please describe any challenges you have faced while using your indoor smart gardening system.

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend your indoor smart gardening system to others?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for likelihood measurement.

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend your indoor smart gardening system to others?

questions.question_text: What additional features would you like to see in future versions of indoor smart gardening systems?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather innovative ideas.

script.question_text: What additional features would you like to see in future versions of indoor smart gardening systems?
